longBusinessSummary: Chongqing Rural Commercial Bank Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of banking services in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Corporate Banking, Personal Banking, and Financial Market Business segments. The Corporate Banking segment offers current accounts, deposits, overdrafts, loans, and trade-related products, as well as engages in foreign currency and other credit services. This segment serves corporates, government agencies, and financial institutions. The Personal Banking segment provides personal loans, deposit products, credit and debit cards, personal wealth management services, and other types of personal intermediary services to individual customers. The Financial Market Business segment engages in money market or repurchase transaction services. It operates branches, including the head office and the business department, branches, first-class sub-branches, second-class sub-branches, branch offices, community sub-branches, and village and township banks, as well as ATMs, multimedia inquiry machines, smart integrated counters, and rural convenience financial self-service points. Chongqing Rural Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.
